Action.author: danielhardman
Action.body: For now, i think we should investigate this as a bug in indy-node; we don't want any misbehaving client to be able to trigger a crash. However, it is possible that research will prove that this is an SDK issue instead of an indy-node issue.

Action.author: srottem
Action.body: Running the .NET test suite on the master branch at commit 8837b640273548c8ef7633f0f2de49856041651e all active tests pass. I haven't seen the issue in a while, so I expect it's fixed.

Action.author: ozheregelya
Action.body: ~srottem , could you please close this ticket as invalid if it doesn't reproduce now?
